entities.name: cannon
entities.description: The cannon is described as the source of the blast that engulfed everyone in a cloud of blue smoke.

entities.name: rear-admiral's hat
entities.description: The rear-admiral's hat is mentioned as exploding from inside the blast.

entities.name: live, white mice
entities.description: Several live, white mice are mentioned as being part of the explosion.

entities.name: High Street
entities.description: The High Street is mentioned as a location where the blast occurred.

relationships.description: The rear-admiral's hat exploded from inside the cannon.
The live, white mice were engulfed by the blast from the cannon.
